text: Bottle Squad with a boom we are ready to zoom
Bottle Squad!
Bottle Squad ! Be strong,
Be brave,
Be smart,
Be kind
Solving problems we don’t mind!
We are the closest friends you’ll ever find.
Bottle Squad
Ba Ba Bottle Squad
Life's Just Beachy
Yay! I can’t wait to go to the beach! It’s going to be so much fun!
Did everyone put their sunscreen on? Remember, you always need to use sunscreen so you don’t get a sunburn!
Yes, we put it on already.
And I packed extra so we can put more on later.
Are we all packed up and ready to go?
Wait, where’s Blake?
Ready! We almost forgot our toys!
Let me help you carry all that, Blake.
Thanks, Ben. Come on let’s go!
Come on, let’s play!
Oops! I guess I don’t know my own strength!
Look! I think something is wrong!
I think they’re stuck!
We need to help them
BA BA BOOM! WE’RE READY TO ZOOM!
We’ve got to think of a plan. And fast!
Ben, can you go tell the lifeguard that someone’s in trouble? Tell her to hurry!
On it!
Now what?
Blake, can you fly over to the boat and push it to the dock with your strength?
Yes! You can count on me!
The paddles suddenly stopped moving. I think they are stuck or broken
Don’t you worry Ma’am. We will have you back on shore in no time
Blake,Wait if you follow the sound of my voice, I think we can make it to the dock!
I’m ready. Lead the way!
Okay, this way!
You got it, a little more to the right!
Great teamwork!
Thank you so much, Bottle Squad!
You saved us!
“If you need our help, you can count on us! That’s our Ba-Ba Promise to you!”
Now where did that beach ball go…?
